files.patch: @@ -9,14 +9,22 @@ Show your code from any Github repo file or diff by simply dropping in an (almos + [jQuery](http://jquery.com) + [Rainbow](https://github.com/ccampbell/rainbow) -Include jquery, jquery.githubcode.js, along with Rainbow for highlighting. +Include dependencies. *see the Rainbow readme for instructions on how to use Rainbow.* ```html - + + + +``` + +Include jquery.githubcode + +```html + ``` Fire the plugin on all classes of `` @@ -27,6 +35,20 @@ $('code.github').githubcode(); ## Usage +Add a `````` tag to your markup, sprinkle in ```data-repo=":owner/:repo"```, ```data-path=":path"```, and ```data-ref=":ref"``` as you see fit. + +### Parameters + ++ data-repo + + Mandatory string - the Github repository to be used; in the form of :owner/:repo, where :owner is the Github username, and :repo is the name of the Github repository. ++ data-path + + Optional string - The content path. ++ data-ref + + Optional string - The String name of the Commit/Branch/Tag. Defaults to master. + + +## Examples + ### Get one file: ```html
